column1: 1. List the differences between the Western Roman Empire and the Eastern Roman Empire.
column2: West: Latin, Rome East: Greek is the language, Constantinople

column1: 2. List the reasons for the fall of the Roman Empire:
column2: Rome Expanded too Much Moral Decline of Society Corruption Diseases Inflation Weak Economy High Taxes High Divorce Rate Expensive Army

column1: 3. What year did the Roman Empire fall?
5. Who controlled the areas that used to be the Roman Empire in the year A.D. 500?
column2: Various German Barbarian Tribes, such as: Vandals Ostrogoths Visigoths Franks Angles Saxons
